sentences.english: I am speaking English but you are acting like sheep, only looking wide-eyed.
sentences.chinese: 我講的是英語，但你表現的像只綿羊，只是睜大眼睛。

sentences.english: He slaughtered the ox and the ram as the fellowship offering for the people.
sentences.chinese: 亞倫宰了那給百姓作平安祭的公牛和公綿羊。

sentences.english: We saw three sheeps in the zoo.
sentences.chinese: 我們在動物園看見三隻綿羊。

sentences.english: Big Sheep and Small Sheep were tired, hungry and thirsty.
sentences.chinese: 大羊和小綿羊疲倦，飢餓和乾渴。

sentences.english: They now outnumber humans in New Zealand by a ratio of 12 to 1.
sentences.chinese: 現在新西蘭的綿羊和居民的數目比率是12比1。

sentences.english: Sheep are known for their thick coat of fleece.
sentences.chinese: 綿羊以一身厚密的羊毛著稱。

sentences.english: Mary had a little lamb, its fleece was white as snow .
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗有隻小綿羊，毛兒白如雪。

sentences.english: Keeping to the natural approach are sheep and guinea fowl.
sentences.chinese: 保持天然的做法包括飼養綿羊和珍珠雞。

sentences.english: To confine in a prison; imprison.
In the country, he can hear birds singing and sheep bleating .
sentences.chinese: 在鄉下，他能聽到鳥兒的鳴唱和綿羊的低吟。

sentences.english: In the two months following Danni’s death, he had lost 3 adult sheep.
sentences.chinese: 在丹尼死後的兩個月，他丟了三隻成年的綿羊。

sentences.english: They used the wool from their sheep to make all of their clothes.
sentences.chinese: 他們用綿羊毛做成了所有的衣服。

sentences.english: It may come from a sheep, goat, or Tibetan antelope .
sentences.chinese: 它有可能來自於一頭綿羊，山羊，或藏羚羊。

sentences.english: Both Big Sheep and Small Sheep were very excited.
sentences.chinese: 大羊和小綿羊都非常興奮。

sentences.english: In the winter sheep have thick fleeces .
The scrapie agent in sheep may be similar to viroids.
sentences.chinese: 綿羊的搔癢病因子可能也是類病毒。

definition: yelling (sound made by person)/barking/braying/roaring (sound made by animals)
one head/a head full of sth/one end (of a stick)/one side/headlong/directly/rapidly/simultaneously
in a low voice/(speak) in whispers
wry face/to grimace/to pull a face/comic face/face mask/devil mask
to leap and frisk about (idiom); lively/healthy and active
